reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be of good quality, with a perfect fit and true-to-size measurements.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: True to size. Great color and fit. Read more
items.author: meby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and so comfortable!
items.body: I bought this dress for my cousin's wedding and also wore it for my sister in law's rehearsal dinner, followed by a Christmas themed swing dance party. It's SO comfortable and flattering. I am 5'3'' and 100ish pounds and ordered a small. It is a little loose around the chest and waist, but not enough that I felt like it needed to be altered. The dark green color is lovely and not see-through at all. Read more
items.author: Natalie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Beautiful dress for the price, comfortable the lining makes a perfect fit, the style allows for casual or dressy. Great quality for the price Read more
items.author: MMurphy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Material
items.body: The material on this dress was soft to the touch. It was a perfect fit and looked exactly like the picture with the details in the fabric. The dress was a perfect dress for the fall, with the sewn in matching layer under the dress. The sleeves were just right also. Read more
items.author: Cathy Matthews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: This dress is beautiful! I sadly ended up returning but only because it was a little too small. But if I lose weight, I’m definitely buying it again. It is very flattering and I don’t generally like dresses on me so that’s really saying something. It seemed like really good quality too. The fabric had a quality weight to it but was also light and airy. I’m so bummed this didn’t fit because I would be buying it in a couple colors otherwise. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Well made. Full skirt that flows very nicely. Great value for the money. Does not wrinkle from what we have seen. Size was exactly as described. Read more
items.author: T. Boynton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: I returned due to it being frumpy looking and fabric was thick and not flowy. I buy a lot of dresses on Amazon and usually have success but this one wasn’t for me. Read more
items.author: Real human real reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and fit
items.body: Love this dress, excellent quality, fit and price. The color was exactly what I wanted and expected. Read more
items.author: Yolanda P.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Turmeric, Wine, Maroon, Navy, Pink, White, Apricot, Dark Blue, Black, Mocha, Brick Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
